review: But it came in German. I'm in America. I had to look up all menu words online (German to English) until I found the option to change the language. It took me about 40 minutes because I was complaining more than thinking and had emailed support too, like you are (not) gonna get a response in 5 minutes. I'm glad they don't have a Chinese model…..But the Fire Stick is great, buy it.

review: It was easy to install and even has a welcome video to show you how to navigate and use the remote even though it's quite simple.  There's a lot of different apps you can use including Netflix and pandora. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to stream movies or music to their TV.

review: Got this at the introductory price and didn't even use it till last month. The connection is a nightmare. I see in the reviews and online that this is a common problem.
